name: Construction Management Portal
initial_requirements: I need a system to help me organize and oversee all aspects of my construction projects in one place.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I expect to identify each construction project with a distinct project record rather than managing all work under a single generic project.
I expect to associate documents, schedules, costs, resources, and communications directly with specific projects so that each item is clearly tied to the correct job.
I expect to specify project tasks or activities as identifiable items that can be used consistently for scheduling, time tracking, and progress tracking.
I intend to manage multiple construction projects concurrently within the same system rather than using a separate tool for each project.
I want the system to cover the full life cycle of a construction project, from creation and planning to ongoing tracking and updates, within one environment.
I want the same system to be used for both high-level project oversight and day-to-day task-level management rather than separating these into different tools.
I want project schedules to include both key milestones and intermediate tasks so I can see a realistic timeline, not just start and end dates.
I want job costing and project cost estimates to include labor, materials, and other relevant expense categories rather than a single undifferentiated total.
I want time tracking data to be linked to specific projects and tasks so that time entries are meaningful for both scheduling and cost estimation.
I want resource management to include both human resources and physical resources such as equipment or materials that are relevant to construction work.
I want communication records related to a project to be accessible alongside that project’s other information so that all context is available in one place.
I want document management to support storing common construction-related files such as drawings, contracts, and specifications under each project.
I want to perform all core project management actions, such as creating projects, updating schedules, and entering costs, through the website interface rather than relying on external tools.
I expect to navigate between documents, schedules, costs, resources, and communications for a given project without having to leave the project’s main context.
I want communication with team members to occur within the same website where project data is stored so that I do not have to switch to separate messaging platforms for project discussions.
I expect that updating project timelines, costs, or resources will be done by editing existing entries rather than recreating them from scratch.
I want all pages and modules of the website to share the same light gray background so the interface appears visually unified.
I want primary interactive UI elements such as buttons, links, and key highlights to use the dark red color to maintain a consistent visual identity.
I prefer that the visual emphasis in the interface comes from the dark red UI elements against the light gray background rather than from multiple competing colors.
I expect project information such as schedules, costs, and progress to be presented in a structured layout that makes it easy to scan and compare between projects.

URL: As a user, I want to manage documents so that I can organize construction project documentation effectively.
As a user, I want to manage project schedules so that I can plan and monitor project timelines.
As a user, I want to use communication tools so that I can communicate with team members within the website.
As a user, I want to estimate job costing so that I can understand and plan project expenses.
As a user, I want to track time so that I can monitor the time spent on project tasks.
As a user, I want to manage resources so that I can allocate and oversee project resources efficiently.
As a user, I want to create projects so that I can start managing new construction jobs on the website.
As a user, I want to manage existing projects so that I can update and oversee ongoing work.
As a user, I want to schedule project timelines so that I can define and adjust key project milestones and deadlines.
As a user, I want to communicate with team members so that everyone stays informed about project updates.
As a user, I want to estimate project costs so that I can budget and forecast financial requirements.
As a user, I want to track project progress so that I can monitor how the project is advancing against the plan.
As a user, I want the website background to be light gray so that the interface is visually consistent with the design requirements.
As a user, I want the UI elements to be dark red so that the website follows the specified color scheme.
instruction: Please develop a construction management website for managing projects and documents. The website should have functionalities for document management, project scheduling, communication tools, estimating job costing, time tracking, and resource management. Users should be able to create and manage projects, schedule project timelines, communicate with team members, estimate project costs, track project progress, and manage resources. Assign light gray to the background and dark red to the UI elements.

name: Medical Journal Portal
initial_requirements: I need a system that lets people easily access and read medical articles and related information online.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I expect to identify articles primarily by keywords such as medical terms, topics, or authors when using the search function.
I expect to locate articles through navigation elements like menus, categories, or journal sections without needing detailed prior information.
I expect the system to provide access to both full articles and related medical information such as abstracts, summaries, or metadata for those articles.
I expect the same set of medical articles and information to be available regardless of whether I access the website from a desktop, tablet, or mobile device.
I expect downloading a PDF to give me the complete content of the article that I can already open and read online.
I want each article page to present the full readable text of the medical content without requiring additional navigation steps within the page.
I expect the search results to show basic information for each article, such as title and at least one short descriptor, so I can judge relevance before opening it.
I want my author account area to clearly separate personal profile information from general browsing content on the site.
I expect my profile within the author account to include typical personal and professional fields relevant to publishing medical articles.
I want to initiate article reading directly from browsing or search results with a single main action such as clicking a title or similar control.
I want to trigger PDF downloads from within the article view or from a clearly associated control so I do not have to leave the article context.
I expect managing my account to be done through dedicated account or profile sections accessible from the main interface.
I expect updating my profile information to happen through editable forms where I can change and save my details in place.
I expect the browsing, searching, reading, and account-management tasks to be accessible through consistent navigation patterns across the site.
I want the user interface layout to adapt automatically to different screen sizes so I do not have to zoom or scroll horizontally on smaller devices.
I expect the seashell background color to be used consistently across pages as the main page background for reading and navigation areas.
I expect crimson to be applied to key interface components such as buttons, links, or headers to create a coherent visual style.
I expect text on the seashell background and crimson components to be clearly readable without eye strain during extended article reading.
I want the visual design to remain consistent across all devices so that colors and styling choices like seashell and crimson appear the same in different views.

URL: As a user, I want to browse the medical journal website so that I can access medical articles and information.
As a user, I want the website to have a user-friendly interface so that it is easy for me to browse and find information.
As a user, I want the website to have a responsive design so that I can easily access it on different devices.
As a user, I want to use a search function so that I can quickly find relevant medical articles and information.
As a user, I want to open articles so that I can read the medical content in detail.
As a user, I want to download article PDFs so that I can access and read them offline.
As a user, I want to manage my account so that I can control my personal information within the author's account.
As a user, I want to update my profile information within the author's account so that my account details remain current.
As a user, I want the website background color to be seashell so that the visual appearance is consistent and pleasant.
As a user, I want components to use crimson so that the interface has a clear and defined design style.
instruction: Please implement a medical journal website for publishing medical articles and information. The website should have a user-friendly interface and responsive design, making it easy for users to browse and find information. The website should include a search function, allowing users to quickly find relevant articles and information, open articals, and download artical PDFs. Users can manage account by updating profile information within the author's account. Configure the background color to seashell, with components using crimson.

name: Entertainment Directory Hub
initial_requirements: I need a system that helps people discover bands and view related promotional content in one place.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I want bands to be identified primarily by their band name so that visitors can find and recognize them easily.
I expect band members to specify external URLs for their pictures, audio samples, and videos instead of uploading large media files directly.
I want advertisers to be identified by a distinct account type separate from band accounts so their actions and permissions remain clearly differentiated.
I only want registered band accounts to be able to create or modify band profiles so that information comes from the bands themselves.
I only want registered advertiser accounts to be able to create or modify advertisements so that ad content is controlled by verified advertisers.
I want all band information, audio samples, videos, and advertisements to be publicly viewable without requiring visitors to log in.
I want each band profile to encompass a brief bio, at least one image, at least one audio sample link, and at least one video link as the minimum information set.
I want advertisements shown on the site to be limited to advertisers who have created accounts on this platform.
I want the band information to focus on background details such as history, genre, and key members instead of exhaustive discographies or technical data.
I want audio samples to be short preview tracks rather than full albums so that users can quickly get a sense of each band’s style.
I want band videos to showcase live performances or official music videos rather than unrelated content.
I want YouTube video links to open the official videos chosen by the band rather than automatically generated or third-party clips.
I want advertisements displayed on the site to be thematically related to music, bands, or events so that they feel relevant to visitors.
I want advertiser-uploaded ad content to include at least an image or banner and a short text description to provide enough context to visitors.
I want visitors to be able to access band profiles, audio samples, videos, and advertisements directly from a single page or a clearly connected set of pages without complex navigation.
I want band members and advertisers to use a standard username-and-password style login process to access their accounts.
I expect band members and advertisers to manage their own content through forms where they can enter and update text and links without needing administrator intervention.
I want visitors to start playing audio samples or videos with a simple click on clearly labeled controls.
I want the floral white background color to be applied consistently across all main pages that present bands and advertisements.
I want dark goldenrod to be used consistently for key interface elements such as navigation bars, headings, and buttons.
I want band profiles to present text, images, audio, and video in a visually grouped layout so visitors can easily see that all items belong to the same band.
I want advertisements to be visually distinguishable from band content while still fitting into the overall floral white and dark goldenrod color scheme.
I want embedded media players for audio and video to visually match the site’s color scheme as closely as possible.

URL: As a user, I want to view band information so that I can learn about different bands.
As a user, I want to listen to audio samples so that I can hear what the bands sound like.
As a user, I want to watch band videos so that I can see their performances.
As a user, I want to view advertisements so that I can see promotional content related to the site.
As a user, I want the page background to use floral white so that the website design is consistent with the specified theme.
As a user, I want site elements to use dark goldenrod so that the interface follows the required color scheme.
As a user, I want bands to be able to register accounts so that band members can manage their information on the site.
As a user, I want band members to be able to log in so that they can securely access and update their band profiles.
As a user, I want band members to input their bio so that visitors can read about the band’s background.
As a user, I want band members to provide picture links so that band images can be displayed on their profiles.
As a user, I want band members to provide audio sample links so that their music can be previewed on the site.
As a user, I want band members to provide direct links to YouTube videos so that visitors can watch their videos easily.
As a user, I want advertisers to be able to register accounts so that they can publish advertisements on the site.
As a user, I want advertisers to be able to log in so that they can securely manage their ad content.
As a user, I want advertisers to upload their ad content so that their advertisements can be displayed on the website.
instruction: Please implement an entertainment directory website to display band information and advertisements. The website should have band registration and login functionality, allowing band members to input their bio, provide picture links and audio sample links, and provide direct links to YouTube videos. Additionally, the website should allow advertisers to register, log in, and upload their ad content. Users should be able to browse band information, listen to audio samples, watch videos, and view advertisements. Implement floral white for the page background and dark goldenrod for the elements.

name: Species BioInfo Database
initial_requirements: I need a system to help me explore and manage biological information about different species.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I expect to identify species primarily by commonly used names and scientific names when browsing or searching.
I want to be able to specify species-related queries using free-text keywords rather than only predefined codes or IDs.
I assume I can select species or records directly from the displayed lists to view more detailed biological information.
I expect the system to focus on species-level biological information rather than covering higher-level taxonomic overviews only.
I assume the database will contain multiple species at once so that comparisons or exploration across species are meaningful.
I expect the same set of biological information fields to be available consistently for each species entry in the database.
I expect each species entry to include both basic identification data and more detailed biological attributes such as habitat or traits.
I want the system to show enough context about each species record in lists so that I can decide quickly whether to open it.
I assume that the information I can manage in the system corresponds directly to the same biological data that I can browse and search.
I expect to navigate between browsing, searching, filtering, and managing data without having to switch to separate tools or applications.
I want to be able to refine or adjust my search results by applying filters after an initial search without starting over.
I expect that when I manage biological information for a species, the changes will be reflected immediately in the browsable and searchable data.
I assume the system will allow me to move from a list of species directly into a detailed view and then back to the list without losing my place.
I expect species-related data to be displayed in a structured, tabular or card-like layout that supports easy scanning of multiple records.
I want filters and search controls to be visible and easily accessible on the same page as the results they affect.
I expect the website to act as a central hub where all species biological information is accessible through a unified interface.

URL: As a user, I want to browse biological information data for different species so that I can explore species-related data.
As a user, I want to search for specific biological information data so that I can quickly find the information I need.
As a user, I want to filter biological information data based on different criteria so that I can narrow down the results to relevant data.
As a user, I want the website to serve as a species biological information database so that I can view and manage biological information data in one place.
instruction: Please implement a species biological information database website for displaying and managing biological information data. The website should have functionalities for browsing, searching, and filtering. Users should be able to browse biological information data for different species, search for specific data, and filter data based on different criteria. Specify linen as the base color and maroon for all components.

name: Startup Story Hub
initial_requirements: I need a system that lets people easily discover and explore entrepreneurial experiences and stories.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I expect to identify articles primarily by their titles and brief summaries when deciding what to read.
I assume I can specify search targets using free-text keywords rather than only choosing from fixed options.
I expect to identify categories by understandable labels that reflect typical entrepreneurial topics rather than technical taxonomy codes.
I assume that browsing articles will allow me to access a sufficiently large and varied collection of entrepreneurial stories rather than just a few curated examples.
I expect category browsing and keyword search together to cover all articles in the system without leaving some content inaccessible.
I assume that my collections and reading history will persist across multiple sessions and devices as long as I use the same account.
I expect that sharing an article will share the specific article I am currently viewing, not a generic link to the platform.
I expect articles to contain substantive narratives about real entrepreneurial experiences rather than purely theoretical business concepts.
I assume that article categories will reflect different dimensions of entrepreneurial experiences, such as industry type, stage of startup, or theme of the story.
I expect search results to prioritize articles whose titles or summaries clearly match my search intent about entrepreneurial journeys.
I expect my reading history to show enough contextual information, such as article title and source, to recognize previously read stories at a glance.
I assume my collections will store full references to articles, not just their URLs, so I can recognize and reopen them easily.
I expect browsing, searching, collecting, and sharing to be accessible from within the same mini-program without requiring external navigation steps first.
I assume that collecting or un-collecting an article can be done with a simple, single interaction from the article list or detail view.
I expect managing my collections to include the ability to remove items from my favorites directly from a collections view.
I assume that viewing and managing my reading history will be accessible only after I am logged into my account.
I expect registering an account and logging in to be initiated from clear entry points within the mini-program’s main interface.
I assume that sharing an article will trigger the native sharing options of the host platform so I can choose among my installed apps or contacts.
I expect the system to remember my login state during a session so that I am not asked to log in again every time I perform an action like collecting or sharing.
I assume that article lists will be presented in a scrollable layout that lets me quickly scan multiple stories.
I expect category navigation to be clearly visible, such as tabs or a list of category buttons, rather than hidden behind multiple menu levels.
I assume search results will be presented in the same visual format as the standard article list so that I do not need to learn a different layout.
I expect the old lace background to be applied consistently across the main browsing, search, and article detail pages.
I assume the rosy brown color theme will be used consistently for key interface elements such as headers, buttons, and highlights.
I expect layout and color styling choices not to interfere with the readability of article text when using the old lace background and rosy brown elements.

URL: As a user, I want to browse entrepreneurial experience and story articles so that I can learn from others’ startup journeys.
As a user, I want to browse articles in different categories so that I can quickly find content that matches my interests.
As a user, I want to search for articles of interest so that I can efficiently locate specific topics or stories.
As a user, I want to collect my favorite articles so that I can easily access them later.
As a user, I want to share articles on other platforms so that I can let others read the entrepreneurial stories I find valuable.
As a user, I want to register an account so that I can have a personalized experience in the mini-program.
As a user, I want to log in to my account so that I can access my personal data and preferences.
As a user, I want to manage my collections so that I can organize and maintain the articles I have saved.
As a user, I want to view and manage my reading history so that I can revisit articles I have read before.
As a user, I want the mini-program layout styled with an old lace background so that the visual appearance matches the specified design.
As a user, I want the interface styled with rosy brown so that the mini-program maintains a consistent color theme.
instruction: Please implement a startup article publishing mini-program to display entrepreneurial experiences and stories. The mini-program should have functions for browsing articles, searching, collecting, and sharing. Users should be able to browse articles in different categories, search for articles of interest, collect favorite articles, and share articles on other platforms. The mini-program should also have user registration and login functions, allowing users to manage their collections and reading history. Style the layout with old lace in the background and rosy brown for the interface.

name: Social Sharing Hub
initial_requirements: I need a platform where I can connect with others and share my personal updates.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I consider an email address or similar unique identifier as the primary way to create and identify my account on the platform.
I expect to identify other users mainly by their name or username when I search for people to connect with.
I expect the platform to support an ongoing network of multiple friends rather than just one-to-one connections.
I assume that all registered users can potentially connect with any other user unless specifically restricted by that user.
I expect that my personal homepage will aggregate both my profile information and my activity updates in one place.
I want my personal profile to contain basic personal details such as my name, a profile picture, and a short description about myself.
I expect the platform to distinguish between my static profile information and my time-based updates or posts.
I expect votes on content to be associated with specific posts or media items rather than with users in general.
I assume that points I earn for uploading pictures are tied to my account and accumulate over time.
I expect my personal updates to include at least text posts and the pictures I upload.
I expect that I must be logged in before I can perform personal actions such as voting, uploading pictures, or viewing my homepage.
I want to be able to initiate friend connections from within the platform rather than relying solely on external tools.
I expect that inviting friends to join the website will be done via contact information such as email or sharable invitation links.
I expect giving a vote on content to be a simple and quick action, such as clicking a button on the content item.
I assume that when I upload a picture, the system will guide me through selecting a file and confirming the upload.
I expect my personal homepage to present my user information in a clearly visible section, separate from my activity feed.
I want my updates on my homepage to be presented in chronological order so that the latest activity appears first.
I expect content items to visibly show the current vote status or score so I can see the impact of my vote.
I expect my accumulated points to be displayed somewhere on my personal homepage or profile so I can see my rewards.
I want pictures I upload to be displayed on my homepage in a way that makes them easy for others to view, such as thumbnails or a gallery.

URL: As a user, I want to register an account so that I can create a personal profile on the social website.
As a user, I want to log in to my account so that I can access my personal features on the website.
As a user, I want to make friends on the website so that I can connect and interact with other users.
As a user, I want to invite friends to join the website so that my friends can also use the social features.
As a user, I want to vote on content so that I can express my opinion on what others share.
As a user, I want to upload pictures so that I can share visual content with other users.
As a user, I want to earn points when I upload pictures so that I am rewarded for sharing content.
As a user, I want to have a personal homepage so that I have a dedicated space on the website.
As a user, I want my personal homepage to display my user information so that others can learn more about me.
As a user, I want my personal homepage to display my updates so that my friends can see my latest activity.
instruction: Please implement a social website for user registration, making friends, and sharing. The website should have a registration function, allowing users to create an account and log in. Users should be able to invite friends to join the website and vote on content. Users should be able to upload pictures and earn points. The website should have a personal homepage that displays user information and updates. Use light cyan as the default background and cadet blue for component styling.

name: Smart Matrimonial Matchmaker
initial_requirements: I need a system that helps me find and connect with a suitable life partner online.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I assume that I will identify myself on the system using a unique personal identifier such as an email address or mobile number during registration.
I want to choose a confidential password or similar secret credential when creating my account.
I expect to be able to specify my basic demographic details (such as age, gender, and location) as part of my profile information.
I expect to be able to specify my preferences for a partner (such as age range, location, or other attributes) as inputs that can be used by search and filtering.
I intend to interact only with other registered users of the same system when searching for and communicating with potential partners.
I expect that the search and filtering options will operate over the entire pool of active user profiles, not just a small subset.
I assume that my profile and photos will be discoverable by other users who are searching for potential partners.
I assume I will be able to perform multiple searches and refine my criteria repeatedly until I find a manageable set of potential partners.
I expect my profile to include both structured fields (such as occupation, education, and religion) and free-text sections for describing myself.
I expect to upload multiple photos rather than being limited to a single image on my profile.
I expect to provide enough personal details in my profile to allow others to evaluate compatibility without needing to ask for basic information repeatedly.
I expect the messaging feature to support exchanging plain text messages at minimum.
I want to be able to access my account and all related features through a standard web browser without needing additional software.
I expect to initiate searches by specifying criteria such as age, location, and other partner attributes through form-based inputs or similar controls.
I expect to refine search results by adjusting filter settings without having to re-enter all my criteria from scratch.
I expect to start a message or chat conversation directly from another user’s profile or search result entry.
I expect to send and receive messages asynchronously, so that communication can continue even when the other person is offline.
I expect the chat functionality to allow me to exchange messages in near real-time when both users are online.
I expect my profile information to be presented in a clear, organized layout that makes it easy for others to scan key details quickly.
I expect search results to be displayed as a list or grid of user profiles showing key information and a photo preview.
I expect filters and advanced search options to be clearly visible and easy to adjust from the search results page.
I expect my photos to be displayed in a way that allows other users to view larger versions when they click on thumbnails.
I expect messages and chats to be displayed in a familiar conversation-style view that groups exchanges by correspondent.

URL: As a user, I want to register on the website so that I can create an account to find partners.
As a user, I want to log in to the website so that I can securely access my matrimonial account.
As a user, I want to create a profile so that I can present myself to potential partners.
As a user, I want to upload photos to my profile so that potential partners can see what I look like.
As a user, I want to fill out personal information in my profile so that potential partners can understand more about me.
As a user, I want to use advanced search options so that I can find partners more precisely.
As a user, I want to use filtering options so that I can narrow down potential partners based on different criteria.
As a user, I want to search for suitable partners based on different criteria so that I can find matches that meet my preferences.
As a user, I want messaging functionality so that I can communicate with potential partners.
As a user, I want chat functionality so that I can have real-time conversations with other users.
instruction: Please implement a smart matrimonial website for users to find partners. The website should have user registration and login functionality, allowing users to create profiles, including uploading photos and filling out personal information. The website should have advanced search and filtering options, enabling users to find suitable partners based on different criteria. The website should also have messaging and chat functionality, allowing users to communicate with each other. Design the site using lemon chiffon as the background and chocolate for content blocks.

name: Skill Connect
initial_requirements: I need a platform that helps people showcase their skills and connect with others based on what they can do.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I assume that each user will be uniquely identified on the platform so that profiles and their associated skills and certifications can be clearly distinguished from one another.
I want to specify my skills and certifications using structured input fields rather than free-form text so that they can be consistently displayed and searched.
I expect to provide enough personal information on my profile (such as name and brief description) so that others can recognize and contextualize my listed skills and certifications.
I assume that every user of the platform will have exactly one primary profile that aggregates all of their skills and certifications.
I want search and browsing to be limited to users who have created profiles on the platform, not external people or data sources.
I expect the platform to focus on professional and skill-related information rather than broader social activities or personal life updates.
I assume that contacting other users happens on a one-to-one basis rather than in large public forums or group channels.
I want profiles to be centered around demonstrable abilities and qualifications rather than general biographical details.
I expect skills to be presented as distinct items that can be individually viewed and evaluated by other users.
I assume certifications will include enough identifying information, such as title and issuing body, to allow others to judge their relevance.
I want search results to show the key skill and certification information needed to decide whether to open a user’s full profile.
I expect browsing another user’s profile to provide an overview of their skills and certifications in one place without needing to perform additional searches.
I want to be able to update or modify my skills and certifications on my profile after they have been initially added.
I expect search for users by skills or certifications to be done through a dedicated search interface where I can enter or select criteria.
I want the process of contacting another user to be initiated directly from their profile or from search results.
I assume that viewing another user’s skills and certifications does not require any special permission beyond being a registered user of the platform.
I expect search filters for skills, certifications, and qualifications to be combinable so that I can narrow down the users that match specific criteria.
I want skills and certifications on a profile to be visually separated into distinct sections so that viewers can easily differentiate between them.
I expect search results and profile pages to use consistent visual styling so that user skills and certifications are recognizable across the platform.
I want the cornsilk background color to be applied consistently across main pages where profiles, search results, and interactions take place.
I expect the peru color to be reserved for elements that are clearly interactive, such as buttons, links, or controls, so that users can quickly see what they can click or tap.
I assume that text describing skills and certifications will remain easily readable against the cornsilk background and in combination with the peru interactive elements.

URL: As a user, I want to create a profile so that I can showcase my personal skills on the platform.
As a user, I want to add skills to my profile so that others can see what I am capable of.
As a user, I want to add certifications to my profile so that others can verify my qualifications.
As a user, I want to search for other users based on their qualifications so that I can connect with people who meet specific criteria.
As a user, I want to browse other users' profiles so that I can learn more about their skills and certifications.
As a user, I want to view other users' skills so that I can assess their expertise.
As a user, I want to view other users' certifications so that I can validate their professional background.
As a user, I want to contact other users so that I can connect and potentially collaborate or learn from them.
As a user, I want to search for other users based on their skills so that I can find people with specific expertise.
As a user, I want to search for other users based on their certifications so that I can find people with particular qualifications.
As a user, I want the layout background to use a cornsilk color so that the platform has the specified visual style.
As a user, I want interactive elements to use a peru color so that clickable or interactive parts of the interface follow the specified design.
instruction: Please implement a skill sharing platform for showcasing personal skills and connecting with others. The platform should allow users to create profiles, add skills and certifications, and search for other users based on their qualifications. Users should be able to browse other users' profiles, view their skills and certifications, and contact them. The platform should also have a search feature that allows users to find other users based on their skills and certifications. Apply cornsilk for the layout background and peru for interactive elements.

name: World of Imagination
initial_requirements: I need a system that helps people explore, express, and be inspired by creativity and imagination together.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I expect other users' creative works to be associated with identifiable creators so I can recognize whose imagination I am exploring.
I expect my own creative works and ideas to be attributable to my user identity rather than being completely anonymous.
I want the system to focus specifically on creativity and imagination-related content rather than general-purpose social interaction.
I expect the system to support both fully developed creative works and shorter, less polished ideas or prompts.
I assume that interaction features such as commenting, replying, or reacting are limited to content within this creativity-focused community.
I expect creative works from others to include enough context or description for me to understand and draw inspiration from them.
I want my user-created content to be visible to other community members who are interested in imagination-focused material.
I expect the share ideas form to allow me to provide both the core idea and some explanatory details so others can interpret my thoughts accurately.
I assume that discussions will be centered around specific creative works, ideas, or themes rather than unrelated topics.
I expect interactions with other users to be tied to the creative content they share, such as their works, ideas, or discussion posts.
I want to browse others' creative works without having to take any mandatory actions such as posting content first.
I expect to be able to select which of my creative works are showcased to others rather than having everything I create auto-published.
I want the share ideas form to be straightforward to use so that submitting my ideas feels quick and low-effort.
I expect discussions to be structured so I can reply directly to specific comments or contributions from other users.
I want to be able to engage with other users through lightweight interactions such as reacting, liking, or acknowledging their contributions.
I expect that I can choose when and how often to interact with others, without being forced into continuous conversation.
I want others' creative works to be presented in a way that makes browsing easy, such as in lists, feeds, or galleries.
I expect my showcased content to be visually grouped or highlighted so that it is clearly distinguishable as my personal creative portfolio.
I want the share ideas form to clearly indicate which fields I should fill in and how my idea will appear once shared.
I expect discussion threads to be displayed in a readable structure that lets me follow the flow of conversation easily.
I want user profiles or identity indicators to be visible alongside creative works, ideas, and discussion posts so I can see who contributed what.

URL: As a user, I want to browse others' creative works so that I can be inspired by their imagination.
As a user, I want to showcase my user-created content so that I can share my imagination with others.
As a user, I want to share my own ideas via the share ideas form so that I can contribute my thoughts to the community.
As a user, I want to participate in discussions so that I can talk about creative ideas with others.
As a user, I want to interact with other users so that I can engage with the community around imagination-focused content.
instruction: Please implement a website called "World of Imagination" to showcase and inspire users' imagination. The website should have functionalities for showcasing user-created content, sharing ideas, discussing, and interacting. Users should be able to browse others' creative works, share their own ideas via the share ideas form, participate in discussions, and interact with other users. Choose azure mist for the background; set all component colors to dark slate blue.

name: Wild Animal Spotter
initial_requirements: I need a system to help me monitor wild animal activity and get timely alerts when certain animals appear.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I assume the system will receive animal observations from one or more sensors or cameras without requiring me to manually enter each detection.
I expect that when an animal is detected, the system will automatically attempt to classify it by species without me needing to trigger a separate recognition action.
I expect the system to support a predefined set of wild animal species relevant to my monitoring area rather than every possible species worldwide.
I want the alert conditions I define to be applied to all future detections until I change or remove those conditions.
I expect the detection records to be stored for a meaningful historical period so that I can review patterns of animal activity over time.
I want each detection record to include at least the animal type, time of detection, and location or source of detection so that the record is useful for review.
I expect the animal information view to include basic facts such as species name, typical habitat, and behavioral traits that are relevant to monitoring them.
I want the system to consistently use the same species labels in detections, records, alerts, and animal information so I can easily correlate data across views.
I expect that when I define personalized alerts, I can specify the target animal species as part of the alert configuration.
I want to be able to configure alert conditions and personalized alerts through controls on the website rather than through an external tool or service.
I expect that when I change my alert preferences, the new settings take effect for subsequent detections without requiring me to restart or reinstall anything.
I want the process of browsing detection records to be navigable via simple web page interactions such as clicking, scrolling, or paging through entries.
I assume I will provide and manage my phone number within the system once, and the system will reuse it for all SMS alerts I configure.
I expect each animal’s assigned color code to be applied consistently across the website wherever that animal appears, such as in detections, records, and alerts displays.
I want the color coding of animals to be represented in visual elements like labels, icons, or highlights rather than only in textual descriptions.
I expect the misty rose body background and firebrick UI color to be applied across all main pages of the website for a uniform visual style.
I assume the website’s color scheme will ensure that the colored animal indicators remain clearly distinguishable against the misty rose background.

URL: As a user, I want the website to recognize wild animals so that I can detect when wild animals appear.
As a user, I want the website to identify different types of wild animals so that I can distinguish between various species.
As a user, I want the system to assign different color codes to each animal so that I can visually differentiate animals at a glance.
As a user, I want to set alert conditions so that I can control when I receive notifications about detected animals.
As a user, I want the system to automatically send an SMS alert when a specific animal is detected so that I can be notified immediately.
As a user, I want to browse detection records so that I can review past animal detections.
As a user, I want to view animal information so that I can learn more about the animals that are detected.
As a user, I want to set personalized alerts so that the notifications I receive match my preferences.
As a user, I want the body background set to misty rose so that the website has the specified visual style.
As a user, I want the UI to use firebrick so that the interface follows the required color scheme.
instruction: Please implement an animal spotter website that recognizes wild animals and sends SMS alerts. The website should have the functionality to identify different types of wild animals, and assign different color codes to each animal. Users should be able to set alert conditions, and when a specific animal is detected, the system will automatically send an SMS alert. Users should be able to browse detection records, view animal information, and set personalized alerts. Set misty rose as the body background and use firebrick for the UI.

name: Ringtone & Wallpaper Hub
initial_requirements: I need a system where I can easily find and get ringtones and wallpapers I like.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I expect to be able to identify specific ringtones by textual attributes such as title, artist, or keywords when searching.
I expect to be able to identify specific wallpapers by textual attributes such as title, theme, or keywords when searching.
I assume I can distinguish between ringtone and wallpaper content types when browsing or searching.
I expect the system to manage both ringtones and wallpapers within the same overall website rather than as separate applications.
I expect browsing to cover the full available catalog of ringtones and wallpapers, not just a small subset.
I assume that downloading ringtones and wallpapers is allowed without any upper limit on the number of items I can download.
I expect my download history to persist over multiple sessions so I can see past downloads whenever I return.
I want ringtone items to include enough descriptive information, such as name and basic metadata, to decide whether to download them.
I want wallpaper items to include enough descriptive information, such as name and basic metadata, to decide whether to download them.
I expect my download history to list both the ringtones and wallpapers I have downloaded together with identifying details for each item.
I assume my user profile page will focus on information related to my downloads and collections rather than unrelated account settings.
I expect collections of ringtones to store references to items rather than requiring me to re-download them to keep them for later.
I expect browsing ringtones and wallpapers to be possible without entering any search terms, by navigating through lists or menus.
I want searching for ringtones or wallpapers to be done through a simple search field where I can type my query and submit it.
I expect to select individual ringtones or wallpapers directly from browse or search result lists using a clear selection control such as a button or link.
I assume that downloading a selected ringtone or wallpaper requires only a single, clear action such as clicking a download button.
I expect categories to be chosen via a visible category menu rather than by manually typing category names.
I expect navigating to my user profile to be possible from any page through a consistent navigation element such as a header or menu link.
I expect adding ringtones to a collection to be possible directly from the same views where I browse or view ringtone details.
I assume I can apply category filters in combination with search so that I can narrow down results effectively.
I expect ringtones and wallpapers to be visually distinguishable in listings, for example by separate sections or labels.
I expect browsing results to be presented as a list or grid where multiple items are visible at once for quick scanning.
I expect filtered or searched content to be displayed on pages that retain the same light goldenrod background and olive drab components as the rest of the site.
I assume the light goldenrod background styling will be applied uniformly across all pages, including the user profile and download history views.
I assume interactive interface elements such as buttons, menus, and links will consistently use the olive drab styling so they are easily recognizable.
I expect my download history and collections to be presented in a readable list format that clearly separates individual items.

URL: As a user, I want to browse ringtones so that I can discover audio content to download.
As a user, I want to browse wallpapers so that I can discover image content to download.
As a user, I want to search for ringtones so that I can quickly find specific audio content I need.
As a user, I want to search for wallpapers so that I can quickly find specific image content I need.
As a user, I want to select ringtones so that I can choose the audio content I want to download.
As a user, I want to select wallpapers so that I can choose the image content I want to download.
As a user, I want to download ringtones so that I can use them on my device.
As a user, I want to download wallpapers so that I can use them on my device.
As a user, I want to navigate to my user profile so that I can access my personal download-related information.
As a user, I want to view my download history in my profile so that I can see which ringtones and wallpapers I have downloaded.
As a user, I want to add ringtones to a collection so that I can keep them for future reference.
As a user, I want to categorize content by selecting a category from the menu so that I can organize and filter ringtones and wallpapers.
As a user, I want the website to provide categorization functions so that I can quickly find the ringtones and wallpapers I need.
As a user, I want the website to provide search functions so that I can quickly locate specific ringtones and wallpapers I need.
As a user, I want all pages styled with a light goldenrod background so that the website has a consistent visual appearance.
As a user, I want components styled in olive drab so that the interface elements have a coherent design.
instruction: Please implement a website for downloading ringtones and wallpapers, providing services for downloading ringtones and wallpapers. The website should have the functionality to download ringtones and wallpapers, allowing users to browse and search for ringtones and wallpapers, select and download the desired content, navigate to the user profile to view the download history, add ringtones to the collection for future reference, and categorize the contents by selecting a category from the menu. The website should also have categorization and search functions to help users quickly find the ringtones and wallpapers they need. Style all pages with a light goldenrod background and olive drab components.

name: Travel Booking Portal
initial_requirements: I need an online system to help me conveniently plan and book my trips.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I expect to specify my travel searches primarily by origin, destination, and travel dates for both trains and flights.
I expect to specify hotel searches primarily by destination location and check-in/check-out dates.
I expect to identify and select specific tickets or hotel options from a list of search results before booking.
I intend the system to cover the full trip workflow from initial search through booking and payment to post-booking order management for each travel component.
I expect the system to support multiple independent bookings within a single overall trip, such as separate transport and hotel reservations.
I assume that both one-way and round-trip journeys need to be supported for train and air travel.
I expect search results for transport and hotels to include enough details, such as times and locations, for me to judge suitability before booking.
I expect order status information to show key details of each booking, such as current state and essential itinerary or stay information.
I expect the system to consolidate all my bookings so that I can see my train, air, and hotel orders together in one place.
I want to perform searching, booking, payment, and order tracking through a web interface without needing to contact any human agent.
I expect the process for trains, flights, and hotels to follow a similar interaction pattern so I do not have to learn different workflows for each.
I expect to complete search, selection, and payment steps in a sequential flow within a single online session for each booking.
I want a visually consistent website where the peach puff background color is applied across all pages that provide travel functionalities.
I want the indian red color to be consistently used for primary interactive components such as cards, panels, or major interface elements.
I expect the color choices for background and components to make content easy to distinguish and visually coherent across search, booking, payment, and order pages.

URL: As a user, I want to search for train tickets so that I can find suitable train journeys to book.
As a user, I want to search for air tickets so that I can find suitable flights to book.
As a user, I want to search for hotels so that I can find suitable accommodations to book.
As a user, I want to book train tickets so that I can reserve my train travel online.
As a user, I want to book air tickets so that I can reserve my flights online.
As a user, I want to book hotels so that I can reserve my accommodation online.
As a user, I want to make online payments so that I can complete my bookings securely and conveniently.
As a user, I want to view my order status so that I can track the progress and details of my bookings.
As a user, I want the website to provide searching, booking, payment, and order management functionalities so that I can handle all my travel arrangements in one place.
As a user, I want the website background layer to use peach puff so that the interface has a consistent visual style.
As a user, I want the component layer to use indian red so that the interface elements have a clear and consistent appearance.
instruction: Please implement an online travel booking website for booking train tickets, air tickets, and hotels. The website should have functionalities for searching, booking, payment, and order management. Users should be able to search and book train tickets, air tickets, and hotels, make online payments, and view order status. Use peach puff in the background layer and indian red for the component layer.

name: Europe Travel & Camping Explorer
initial_requirements: I need a system to help me discover, plan, and share my travel and camping experiences across Europe.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I expect to be able to specify destinations by selecting a country first and then narrowing down to a specific city.
I expect to search for tourist attractions and campsites using basic keywords such as place names, attraction types, or campsite names.
I only want tourist attractions and campsites that are physically located within European countries to be included in the system.
I expect the same core functionality for both tourist attractions and campsites, rather than treating them as completely separate systems.
I expect the system to support both short city trips and longer multi-stop camping journeys within Europe.
I want search and browse results for tourist attractions and campsites to include essential details such as name, location, and a brief description.
I want tourist attraction entries to include enough information to decide whether they are worth visiting, such as type of attraction and relevance to tourists.
I want campsite entries to include enough information to judge their suitability for camping, such as the fact that they are designated camping locations.
I expect bookings for tourist attractions and campsites to be tied to specific dates or date ranges relevant to my trip.
I want reviews for tourist attractions and campsites to be associated with specific places I have actually visited.
I expect my reviews to be visible to other users who are looking at the same tourist attractions or campsites.
I want to be able to perform search and browsing actions without having to switch between separate platforms for web and mobile web.
I expect the booking process for tourist attractions and campsites to be initiated directly from the respective attraction or campsite details page.
I want to be able to submit a review through a simple form once I have selected the attraction or campsite I visited.
I expect to interact with the system primarily through a graphical user interface instead of command-line or text-only interactions.
I want tourist attractions and campsites to be displayed in a structured list or grid so I can scan multiple options at a glance.
I expect tourist attractions and campsites to be visually distinguished from each other so I can easily tell which type of place I am looking at.
I want the light pink main background to be consistently applied on both the website and the web app interfaces.
I want medium violet red to be applied to primary controls such as buttons and key interactive elements so they stand out against the light pink background.
I expect the overall visual design to emphasize a friendly, leisure-oriented travel and camping theme consistent with the chosen colors.

URL: As a user, I want to search for tourist attractions and campsites so that I can easily find places of interest across Europe.
As a user, I want to browse tourist attractions in different countries and cities so that I can discover places to visit in my desired locations.
As a user, I want to browse campsites in different countries and cities so that I can find suitable camping options across Europe.
As a user, I want to book tourist attractions of interest so that I can secure my visit in advance.
As a user, I want to book campsites of interest so that I can reserve my camping stays in advance.
As a user, I want to review the tourist attractions I have visited so that I can share my experience with others.
As a user, I want to review the campsites I have visited so that I can provide feedback for future visitors.
As a user, I want the website and web app to showcase tourist attractions across Europe so that I can plan my travel within the continent.
As a user, I want the website and web app to showcase campsites across Europe so that I can plan my camping trips within the continent.
As a user, I want the website and web app to use a light pink main background so that the visual design is consistent with the specified style.
As a user, I want the controls to use medium violet red so that the interactive elements are styled according to the specified design.
instruction: Please implement a travel and camping website and web app for Europe, showcasing tourist attractions and campsites across the continent. The website should have functionalities for searching, booking, and reviewing. Users should be able to browse tourist attractions and campsites in different countries and cities, book attractions and campsites of interest, and review the attractions and campsites they have visited. Establish light pink as the main background and medium violet red for the controls.

name: Car Rental Booking Platform
initial_requirements: I need a system that helps me conveniently find and book rental cars.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I assume I will identify available rental cars primarily by specifying location and rental period before browsing detailed car options.
I expect to specify rental dates and times using intuitive date and time pickers rather than entering them as free text.
I expect to identify my bookings by obvious attributes such as booking ID, car details, and rental dates when reviewing my booking records.
I expect the system to handle both one-time rentals and multiple concurrent or future reservations under the same user account.
I expect the order management functionality to apply to all my bookings, including upcoming, active, and completed rentals.
I assume the platform will support multiple commonly used payment methods rather than just a single card type.
I expect each car type to be presented with essential details such as model, passenger capacity, luggage capacity, and transmission type to help me decide which car suits my needs.
I expect to see clear information about rental periods, including pickup and drop-off date and time, whenever I view or manage a booking record.
I expect the payment section to show all available payment options together so I can easily identify my preferred method.
I prefer a booking flow that guides me step by step from browsing cars to confirming payment without requiring me to navigate unrelated pages manually.
I expect to be able to modify or cancel bookings directly from my booking records through clear action controls rather than contacting support.
I expect the platform to provide clear confirmation or feedback messages after I perform key actions such as booking a car or updating an order.
I assume that once I choose a payment method, the system will remember or prominently display that choice during the booking flow.
I expect the user-friendly interface to use a clean layout with obvious navigation elements so that browsing and booking actions are easy to discover.
I expect the papaya whip background color to be applied consistently across main pages so the interface looks visually cohesive.
I expect dark orange styling to be used consistently for key UI components such as buttons, highlights, and interactive elements to create a recognizable visual theme.
I assume that text and icons placed on papaya whip backgrounds and dark orange components will maintain sufficient contrast to keep the interface easy to read.
I expect my booking records to be presented in an organized list or table with clear separation between entries so I can quickly scan past and upcoming rentals.

URL: As a user, I want a user-friendly interface so that I can easily browse and book car rental services.
As a user, I want to browse different types of cars so that I can choose a vehicle that suits my needs.
As a user, I want to select rental dates and times so that I can schedule my car rental period accurately.
As a user, I want to book selected cars so that I can confirm my car rental reservations.
As a user, I want to view my booking records so that I can review my past and upcoming car rentals.
As a user, I want the platform to support multiple payment methods so that I can pay using my preferred payment option.
As a user, I want the platform to provide order management functionality so that I can manage my rental orders effectively.
As a user, I want the platform background set to papaya whip so that the overall interface has the specified appearance.
As a user, I want components styled with dark orange so that the platform’s components follow the specified color scheme.
instruction: Please implement a comprehensive car rental platform for booking car rental services. The platform should have a user-friendly interface, allowing users to easily browse and book car rental services. Users should be able to browse different types of cars, select rental dates and times, book selected cars, and view booking records. The platform should support multiple payment methods and provide order management functionality. Set the background to papaya whip, and apply dark orange to components.

name: Travel Ticket Booking Platform
initial_requirements: I need a system that allows me to easily find and book bus and train journeys.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I expect to specify my journeys primarily by choosing an origin, a destination, and a travel date.
I expect to identify bus and train journeys using common location names such as city names or station names rather than technical route codes.
I expect the system to distinguish clearly between bus services and railway services when I am searching or booking.
I assume the system will cover both one-way and return journeys for buses and trains.
I assume the system will only show me journeys that actually have seats available to book.
I expect the system to focus exclusively on scheduled intercity or regional bus and train services, not other transport modes.
I expect search results for journeys to include departure and arrival times for each option.
I expect journey options to show the operator name or company running the bus or train.
I expect the system to show the seat class or category associated with a ticket where applicable.
I expect the system to present the total ticket cost including all mandatory fees before I confirm a booking.
I expect booking confirmations to include essential trip details such as date, time, route, seat information, and booking reference.
I expect my booking history to show key details like travel dates, routes, and ticket status for each past booking.
I expect to complete both search and booking tasks in a single continuous flow without needing to switch to other channels.
I expect that I can search for journeys without being forced to log in, but I will need an account to manage or review my bookings.
I expect to select a specific journey from a list of search results and then proceed directly to seat selection and payment.
I expect that after payment, the system will automatically trigger the sending of booking confirmations without requiring additional actions from me.
I expect the account registration process to collect only information that is necessary to support booking and managing tickets.
I expect bus and train options to be displayed in a clear list or similar structured layout that allows easy comparison.
I expect real-time seat availability to be presented in a way that makes it obvious which seats are free and which are already taken.
I expect real-time ticket prices to be displayed next to each journey option so I can compare fares at a glance.
I expect the responsive design to preserve the same core functionalities on both mobile and desktop, with layouts adjusted to screen size.
I expect the snow background and dim gray components to create a visually minimalistic interface without bright accent colors dominating the screen.
I expect print options to format tickets in a clean, readable layout optimized for standard paper sizes.

URL: As a user, I want to search for bus tickets so that I can find suitable bus journeys.
As a user, I want to search for railway tickets so that I can find suitable train journeys.
As a user, I want to book bus tickets so that I can reserve seats on my chosen bus.
As a user, I want to book railway tickets so that I can reserve seats on my chosen train.
As a user, I want to view real-time seat availability so that I can know which seats are currently available before booking.
As a user, I want to view real-time ticket prices so that I can see the current fares before booking.
As a user, I want to make secure payments so that my payment information is protected during transactions.
As a user, I want to receive booking confirmations via email so that I have a record of my ticket in my inbox.
As a user, I want to receive booking confirmations via SMS so that I can access my ticket details on my phone.
As a user, I want to register an account so that I can manage my bookings on the platform.
As a user, I want to log in to my account so that I can access my personalized booking information.
As a user, I want to view my booking history so that I can review my past trips and reservations.
As a user, I want ticket printing options so that I can print my tickets when needed.
As a user, I want the platform to have a responsive design so that it works well on both mobile and desktop devices.
As a user, I want all backgrounds configured with a snow color so that the interface has a consistent minimalistic background.
As a user, I want all components configured with a dim gray color so that the interface elements have a consistent minimalistic appearance.
instruction: Please implement a minimalistic bus and railway ticket booking platform where users can search and book bus and railway tickets, view real-time seat availability and prices, make secure payments, and receive booking confirmations via email or SMS. The platform should have user account management features, including user registration, login, booking history, and ticket printing options. Additionally, the platform should have a responsive design that adapts to both mobile and desktop devices. Configure all backgrounds with snow and all components with dim gray.

name: Golf Travel Package Booker
initial_requirements: I need a system to help me plan and book customized golf travel packages.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I expect the homepage form to be directly accessible without requiring login or account creation before I can submit a golf travel request.
I want to specify my golf travel needs in a structured way using fields for dates, destinations, number of travelers, and golf-related preferences rather than entering everything as free text.
I expect to be able to provide both personal contact details and travel preference details in the same request flow so that the system has enough information to respond.

I want the system to handle the full scope of a golf trip, including hotel, flights, local transport, and golf activities, within a single package enquiry instead of treating each component as a separate booking.
I expect to be able to request packages for multiple travelers in one enquiry so that my group can be managed under a single trip.
I expect the same trip request to cover both outbound and return travel rather than requiring separate submissions for each direction.
I want to specify my hotel preferences using criteria such as star rating, room type, meal plan, and proximity to golf courses rather than generic comments.
I want to specify my flight preferences using details like departure airport, preferred times, cabin class, and baggage needs so that the system can filter suitable options.
I want to specify my local transport preferences such as private vs. shared transfers, vehicle type, and pick-up times to ensure the transport matches my expectations.
I want to specify my golf preferences including number of rounds, tee time ranges, course difficulty, and cart or caddie needs so that suggested activities reflect my playing style.
I expect package quotes to clearly list what is included and excluded for each component of the trip so that I can interpret the price correctly.
I expect the digital vouchers to contain all essential reservation details such as dates, times, locations, and confirmation numbers for each booked service.
I want invoices to show a breakdown of costs by component of the golf package rather than a single lump-sum amount.
I expect the system to retain my past preferences so that future package suggestions can reuse my usual hotel, flight, and golf choices.
I want to receive an immediate acknowledgement after submitting a travel request so that I know my enquiry has been captured.
I expect the process from enquiry to booking confirmation to be handled online without requiring phone calls or in-person visits.
I want to be able to review the proposed package details before I commit to confirming the booking online.
I expect my quotes, bookings, vouchers, and invoices to be accessible from a single place in the website so that I do not have to search through emails.
I want the system to use my stored profile and history in the customer relationship management functionality so that I do not have to re-enter the same information for each trip.
I expect my enquiries and subsequent interactions about the same trip to be linked together so that the website can handle them as a single case.
I want the website to communicate with suppliers on my behalf rather than requiring me to contact hotels, airlines, or golf courses directly.
I expect booking confirmations, vouchers, and invoices to be delivered electronically, such as via email or a downloadable link, instead of being sent by post.
I want the homepage form for submitting golf travel requests to be prominently visible on the homepage without needing to navigate through subpages.
I expect the use of whitesmoke for the body background to be applied consistently across all website pages so that the visual style does not change between steps.
I want dark cyan elements to be used to highlight key interactive components such as buttons, headers, and main sections so that important actions stand out.
I expect quotes, vouchers, and invoices to be presented in a clean, readable layout that aligns with the overall whitesmoke and dark cyan color scheme.
I want the website to visually differentiate between enquiry, quote, and confirmed booking states so that I can immediately see the status of my trip.

URL: As a user, I want to submit a golf travel request via the website homepage form so that I can initiate a booking enquiry.
As a user, I want the system to collect my information based on my preferences so that my golf travel package is tailored to my needs.
As a user, I want the system to dynamically apply hotel conditions so that my accommodation matches my specified preferences.
As a user, I want the system to dynamically apply flight conditions so that my flights align with my travel requirements.
As a user, I want the system to dynamically apply transport conditions so that my local transportation fits my itinerary.
As a user, I want the system to dynamically apply golf conditions so that my golf activities suit my playing preferences.
As a user, I want to receive online quotes for golf travel packages so that I can understand the pricing before confirming a booking.
As a user, I want to confirm my golf travel bookings online so that I can finalize my trip conveniently.
As a user, I want the system to generate digital vouchers for my confirmed booking so that I have proof of my reservations.
As a user, I want the system to generate digital invoices for my confirmed booking so that I can keep a record of my payment.
As a user, I want the website to handle my customer requests so that my enquiries and bookings are properly processed.
As a user, I want my relationship and interactions to be managed by the customer relationship management functionality so that my ongoing travel needs are better supported.
As a user, I want the website to manage suppliers involved in my trip so that hotels, flights, transport, and golf services are coordinated effectively.
As a user, I want the website’s body background to use whitesmoke so that the overall appearance is visually consistent.
As a user, I want the main components of the website to use dark cyan so that key sections are visually highlighted.
instruction: Please implement a golf travel package booking website that sells golf travel packages. The website should have functionalities for customer request handling, booking confirmation, online quotes, customer relationship management, and supplier management. Users can initiate requests through the website homepage form submission, and the system will collect information based on customer preferences and dynamically apply hotel, flight, transport, and golf conditions. Customers can confirm bookings online, and the system will generate digital vouchers and invoices. Assign whitesmoke to body backgrounds and dark cyan to main components.

name: Travel Expense Reimbursement System
initial_requirements: I need a system to help manage and reimburse my work-related travel expenses.

Implicit Requirements.RequirementText: I expect to specify each trip by basic travel details such as destination, dates, and purpose before booking tickets or hotels.
I want to identify each travel expense item with attributes like expense type, date, and amount when it is later used in settlement reports and reimbursement applications.
I expect the system to support only work-related trips and to exclude personal travel from bookings and reimbursements.
I expect the same system to cover the entire travel lifecycle from booking through reimbursement without needing a separate tool in between.
I expect the system to handle multiple trips and their corresponding reimbursements in parallel, rather than only one trip at a time.
I expect ticket booking information such as itinerary, cost, travel dates, and provider details to be available for later use in settlement reports and reimbursement applications.
I expect hotel booking information such as check-in and check-out dates, room rate, and hotel name to be included as expense items in settlement reports.
I expect train booking details such as departure and arrival stations, times, and fares to be included when calculating total trip expenses.
I want settlement reports to aggregate all relevant expenses for a trip into a clear total amount eligible for reimbursement.
I expect settlement reports to include a breakdown of expenses by category, such as tickets, hotels, and trains, instead of only a single combined total.
I expect reimbursement applications to reference a specific settlement report so that the claimed amounts align with previously summarized expenses.
I expect the reimbursement status view to show at least the current state of each application and whether it has been approved or rejected.
I want to initiate travel bookings directly within the system rather than being redirected to external booking tools.
I expect to submit a reimbursement application only after reviewing or generating a settlement report for the corresponding trip.
I want to be able to select which trip or set of expenses to include when generating a settlement report instead of always reporting all historical expenses.
I expect to navigate from a list of reimbursement applications to the detailed view of an individual application's status.
I prefer that booking, reporting, and reimbursement functions are accessible from a unified interface rather than scattered across different systems.
I expect all main content containers across the system to consistently use a white background wherever they appear.
I expect all key interactive components such as buttons, tabs, and primary controls to use navy visuals to align with the specified design style.
I expect the navy component visuals to be clearly distinguishable from the white container backgrounds to maintain visual hierarchy.
I expect the reimbursement status information to be presented in a clear, readable layout that fits the white background and navy component visual scheme.

URL: As a user, I want to book tickets so that I can arrange my travel transportation.
As a user, I want to book hotels so that I can secure accommodation for my trip.
As a user, I want to book trains so that I can plan my rail travel.
As a user, I want to generate settlement reports so that I can summarize my travel expenses.
As a user, I want to submit reimbursement applications so that I can get my travel expenses reimbursed.
As a user, I want to view reimbursement status so that I can track the progress of my reimbursement.
As a user, I want the container backgrounds to be white so that the system interface is consistent with the design requirements.
As a user, I want the component visuals to be navy so that the system interface matches the specified visual style.
instruction: Please implement a travel reimbursement and payment system for employee travel expenses. The system should have functionalities for booking tickets, hotels, and trains, generating settlements, submitting reimbursement applications, and more. Users should be able to book tickets, hotels, and trains, generate settlements report, submit reimbursement applications, and view reimbursement status. Use white for container backgrounds and navy for component visuals.
